markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Magic Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=182)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 349 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Patron Theme**
[Rune](/Patrons.aspx?ID=6)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 weapon that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

The weapon glimmers with magic and energy. The target becomes a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) weapon_, gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.
name: Magic Weapon

<traits>
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 349 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Patron Theme**
[Rune](/Patrons.aspx?ID=6)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

 

 
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

 

**Target** 1 weapon that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Make a weapon temporarily magical.
</summary>
target: 1 weapon that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally

text: Magic Weapon Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 349 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Occult Spell Lists Elemental Patron Theme Rune Cast somatic, verbal Range touch Target 1 weapon that is unattended or wielded by you or a willing ally Duration 1 minute --- The weapon glimmers with magic and energy. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon , gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.
